Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to modify

Tables:
  ~ orders
    + orders_delete_trigger (trigger)

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER orders_delete_trigger
    AFTER DELETE ON orders
    REFERENCING OLD TABLE AS old_orders
    FOR EACH STATEMENT
    EXECUTE FUNCTION archive_deleted_orders();
